text: Nocardiopsis composta is a bacterium from the genus of Nocardiopsis which has been isolated from a composting facility in Germany.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == References == == Further reading == * ==External links== *Type strain of Nocardiopsis composta at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase Category:Actinomycetales Category:Bacteria described in 2002
title: Nocardiopsis composta
